Name: Straimium Immortaly
About the game: ~ In the far stars of Straimium, Queenis nestle in Cubicus nests. There they birth meany nasties to wage ever lasting Cubos War against rivaly Queeni Emperess. Straima Ninjas, holiest warriors, lead these Immortaly Incursions. Are you one such hallow Straima? Dare you breach the... Cubicus? ~ Gameplay Straimium Immortaly is a shmup roguelike dungeoncrawler. Explore the butts-hard procedurally generated Cubicus battling beasties, looting endless item and weapon upgrades and defeating huge boss meanies in your vengeful quest to eradicate the Queeni Emperess. The game includes a slew of goodies to keep gameplay fresh, such as unlockable character classes, world mutators, cheats and hats, Cubicus design seeds and over a hundred weapons, items, and ninja powers to master. There's 6 game modes to unlock including a Boss Rush, an arcade platformer, and Galaxy-wide Incursion purge, and even online leaderboards where you can battle for high scores and the fastest speed runs!
